1 var Net = require('net'),
  2   EventEmitter = require('events').EventEmitter,
  3   Util = require('util'),
  4   ErrorMessages = require('./constants/ErrorMessages'),
  5   DATA_TYPES = require('./constants/DataTypes'),
  6   CASConstants = require('./constants/CASConstants'),
  7   PacketReader = require('./packets/PacketReader'),
  8   PacketWriter = require('./packets/PacketWriter'),
  9   ActionQueue = require('./utils/ActionQueue'),
 10   Helpers = require('../src/utils/Helpers'),
 11   Cache = require('../src/utils/Cache');
 12 
 13 var ClientInfoExchangePacket = require('./packets/' + '/ClientInfoExchangePacket'),
 14   OpenDatabasePacket = require('./packets/' + '/OpenDatabasePacket'),
 15   GetEngineVersionPacket = require('./packets/' + '/GetEngineVersionPacket'),
 16   ExecuteQueryPacket = require('./packets/' + '/ExecuteQueryPacket'),
 17   GetSchemaPacket = require('./packets/' + '/GetSchemaPacket.js'),
 18   CloseQueryPacket = require('./packets/' + '/CloseQueryPacket'),
 19   BatchExecuteNoQueryPacket = require('./packets/' + '/BatchExecuteNoQueryPacket'),
 20   CloseDatabasePacket = require('./packets/' + '/CloseDatabasePacket'),
 21   FetchPacket = require('./packets/' + '/FetchPacket'),
 22   SetAutoCommitModePacket = require('./packets/' + '/SetAutoCommitModePacket'),
 23   RollbackPacket = require('./packets/' + '/RollbackPacket'),
 24   CommitPacket = require('./packets/' + '/CommitPacket'),
 25   LOBReadPacket = require('./packets/' + '/LOBReadPacket'),
 26   LOBNewPacket = require('./packets/' + '/LOBNewPacket'),
 27   LOBWritePacket = require('./packets/' + '/LOBWritePacket'),
 28   SetDbParameterPacket = require('./packets/' + '/SetDbParameterPacket'),
 29   GetDbParameterPacket = require('./packets/' + '/GetDbParameterPacket'),
 30   PrepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket = require('./packets/' + '/PrepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket');
 31 
 32 module.exports = CUBRIDConnection;
 33 
 34 //Support custom events
 35 Util.inherits(CUBRIDConnection, EventEmitter);
 36 
 37 /**
 38  * Create a new CUBRID connection instance
 39  * @param brokerServer
 40  * @param brokerPort
 41  * @param user
 42  * @param password
 43  * @param database
 44  * @param cacheTimeout
 45  * @constructor
 46  */
 47 function CUBRIDConnection(brokerServer, brokerPort, user, password, database, cacheTimeout) {
 48   //Using EventEmitter.call on an object will do the setup of instance methods / properties
 49   //(not inherited) of an EventEmitter.
 50   //It is similar in purpose to super(...) in Java or base(...) in C#, but it is not implicit in Javascript.
 51   //Because of this, we must manually call it ourselves:
 52   EventEmitter.call(this);
 53 
 54   this._queryCache = null;
 55   if (typeof cacheTimeout !== 'undefined' && cacheTimeout > 0) {
 56     this._queryCache = new Cache();
 57   }
 58 
 59   this._socket = new Net.Socket();
 60 
 61   //Connection parameters
 62   this.brokerServer = brokerServer || 'localhost';
 63   this.initialBrokerPort = brokerPort || 33000;
 64   this.connectionBrokerPort = -1;
 65   this.user = user || 'public';
 66   this.password = password || '';
 67   this.database = database || 'demodb';
 68 
 69   //Session public variables
 70   this.autoCommitMode = null; //will be initialized on connect
 71   this.sessionId = 0;
 72 
 73   //Execution semaphore variables; prevent double-connect-attempts, overlapping-queries etc.
 74   this.connectionOpened = false;
 75   this.connectionPending = false;
 76   this.queryPending = false;
 77 
 78   //Driver events
 79   this.EVENT_ERROR = 'error';
 80   this.EVENT_CONNECTED = 'connect';
 81   this.EVENT_ENGINE_VERSION_AVAILABLE = 'engine version';
 82   this.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED = 'batch execute done';
 83   this.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'query data';
 84   this.EVENT_SCHEMA_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'schema data';
 85   this.EVENT_FETCH_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'fetch';
 86   this.EVENT_FETCH_NO_MORE_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'fetch done';
 87   this.EVENT_BEGIN_TRANSACTION = 'begin transaction';
 88   this.EVENT_SET_AUTOCOMMIT_MODE_COMPLETED = 'set autocommit mode';
 89   this.EVENT_COMMIT_COMPLETED = 'commit';
 90   this.EVENT_ROLLBACK_COMPLETED = 'rollback';
 91   this.EVENT_QUERY_CLOSED = 'close query';
 92   this.EVENT_CONNECTION_CLOSED = 'close';
 93   this.EVENT_LOB_READ_COMPLETED = 'LOB read completed';
 94   this.EVENT_LOB_NEW_COMPLETED = 'LOB new completed';
 95   this.EVENT_LOB_WRITE_COMPLETED = 'LOB write completed';
 96   this.EVENT_SET_DB_PARAMETER_COMPLETED = 'set db parameter completed';
 97   this.EVENT_GET_DB_PARAMETER_COMPLETED = 'get db parameter completed';
 98 
 99   //Auto-commit constants
100   this.AUTOCOMMIT_ON = true;
101   this.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF = !this.AUTOCOMMIT_ON;
102 
103   //Database schema variables
104   this.SCHEMA_TABLE = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_CLASS;
105   this.SCHEMA_VIEW = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_VCLASS;
106   this.SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_ATTRIBUTE;
107   this.SCHEMA_CONSTRAINT = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_CONSTRAIT;
108   this.SCHEMA_PRIMARY_KEY = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_PRIMARY_KEY;
109   this.SCHEMA_IMPORTED_KEYS = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_IMPORTED_KEYS;
110   this.SCHEMA_EXPORTED_KEYS = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_EXPORTED_KEYS;
111   this.SCHEMA_CLASS_PRIVILEGE = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_CLASS_PRIVILEGE;
112 
113   //LOB types variables
114   this.LOB_TYPE_BLOB = CASConstants.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_BLOB;
115   this.LOB_TYPE_CLOB = CASConstants.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_CLOB;
116 
117   this._CASInfo = [0, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF];
118   this._queriesPacketList = [];
119   this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH = -1;
120   this._PREVENT_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS = true;
121   this._LOB_MAX_IO_LENGTH = 128 * 1024;
122 
123   //Database engine version
124   this._DB_ENGINE_VER = '';
125 
126   //Timeout values (msec.)
127   this._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = 0;
128 
129   //Enforce execute query using the old protocol
130   this._ENFORCE_OLD_QUERY_PROTOCOL = false;
131 
132   // Each element in the queries queue array contains:
133   // 0:query handle, 1:sql, 2:query status, 3:callback to call when done
134   this._queriesQueue = [];
135   this._QUERY_INFO = {
136     HANDLE   : 0,
137     SQL      : 1,
138     STATUS   : 2,
139     CALLBACK : 3,
140     SQL_TYPE : 4
141   };
142 
143   this._QUERY_STATUS = {
144     NOT_STARTED  : 0,
145     IN_EXECUTION : 1,
146     CLOSED       : 2
147   };
148 
149   this._SQL_TYPE = {
150     IS_QUERY     : 0,
151     IS_NON_QUERY : 1
152   };
153 
154   // Queries queue check interval (msec.)
155   // You can try to reduce this value to speed-up queries queue processing
156   // However, a small value will introduce a memory overhead and potential queries collision side effects
157   this._QUERIES_QUEUE_CHECK_INTERVAL = 1000;
158 
159   // Current active status of the queries queue background processor
160   this._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED = false;
161 
162   // Used for standard callbacks 'err' parameter
163   this._NO_ERROR = null;
164 
165   //Uncomment the following lines if you will not always provide an 'error' listener in your consumer code,
166   //to avoid any unexpected exception. Be aware that:
167   //Error events are treated as a special case in node. If there is no listener for it,
168   //then the default action is to print a stack trace and exit the program.
169   //http://nodejs.org/api/events.html
170   //this.on('error',function(err){
171   //Helpers.logError(err.message);
172   ////... (add your own error-handling code)
173   //});
174 }
175 
176 /**
177  * Get broker connection port
178  * @param self
179  * @param callback
180  * @private
181  */
182 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._doGetBrokerPort = function (self, callback) {
183   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
184   self._socket = Net.createConnection(self.initialBrokerPort, self.brokerServer);
185   self._socket.setNoDelay(true);
186   self._socket.setTimeout(this._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);
187 
188   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
189   var clientInfoExchangePacket = new ClientInfoExchangePacket();
190   clientInfoExchangePacket.write(packetWriter);
191   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
192 
193   self._socket.on('timeout', function (err) {
194     this.connectionOpened = false;
195     callback.call(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT));
196   });
197 
198   self._socket.on('error', function (err) {
199     this.connectionOpened = false;
200     callback.call(self, err);
201   });
202 
203   self._socket.once('data', function (data) {
204     self._socket.setTimeout(0); //clear connection timeout
205     var packetReader = new PacketReader();
206     packetReader.write(data);
207     clientInfoExchangePacket.parse(packetReader);
208     var newPort = clientInfoExchangePacket.newConnectionPort;
209     self.connectionBrokerPort = newPort;
210     if (newPort > 0) {
211       self._socket.end();
212     }
213     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
214       if (newPort >= 0) {
215         callback.call(null);
216       } else {
217         err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NEW_BROKER_PORT);
218         callback.call(self, err);
219       }
220     }
221   });
222 };
223 
224 /**
225  * Login to a database
226  * @param self
227  * @param callback
228  * @private
229  */
230 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._doDatabaseLogin = function (self, callback) {
231   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
232   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
233   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
234 
235   if (self.connectionBrokerPort > 0) {
236     self._socket = Net.createConnection(self.connectionBrokerPort, self.brokerServer);
237     self._socket.setNoDelay(true);
238     self._socket.setTimeout(self._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);
239   }
240 
241   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
242   var openDatabasePacket = new OpenDatabasePacket(
243     {
244       database : self.database,
245       user     : self.user,
246       password : self.password,
247       casInfo  : self._CASInfo
248     }
249   );
250   openDatabasePacket.write(packetWriter);
251   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
252 
253   self._socket.on('timeout', function (err) {
254     self._socket.end();
255     this.connectionOpened = false;
256     callback.call(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT));
257   });
258 
259   self._socket.on('error', function (err) {
260     self.connectionOpened = false;
261     callback.call(self, err);
262   });
263 
264   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
265     self._socket.setTimeout(0); //clear connection timeout
266     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
267     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
268       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
269       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
270     }
271     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
272       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
273       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
274       packetReader.write(responseData);
275       openDatabasePacket.parse(packetReader);
276       self._CASInfo = openDatabasePacket.casInfo;
277       var errorCode = openDatabasePacket.errorCode;
278       var errorMsg = openDatabasePacket.errorMsg;
279       if (errorCode !== 0) {
280         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
281       } else {
282         self.sessionId = openDatabasePacket.sessionId;
283         self.autoCommitMode = (self._CASInfo[3] & 0x01) ? self.AUTOCOMMIT_ON : self.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF;
284       }
285       callback.call(self, err);
286     }
287   });
288 };
289 
290 /**
291  * Get the server database engine version
292  * @param callback
293  */
294 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._getEngineVersion = function (self, callback) {
295   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
296   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
297   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
298 
299   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
300   var getEngineVersionPacket = new GetEngineVersionPacket(
301     {
302       casInfo : self._CASInfo
303     }
304   );
305 
306   getEngineVersionPacket.write(packetWriter);
307   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
308 
309   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
310     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
311     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
312       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
313       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
314     }
315     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
316       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
317       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
318       packetReader.write(responseData);
319       getEngineVersionPacket.parse(packetReader);
320       var errorCode = getEngineVersionPacket.errorCode;
321       var errorMsg = getEngineVersionPacket.errorMsg;
322       if (errorCode !== 0) {
323         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
324       } else {
325         self._DB_ENGINE_VER = getEngineVersionPacket.engineVersion;
326       }
327       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
328         callback.call(self, err);
329       }
330     }
331   });
332 };
333 
334 /**
335  * Connect to database
336  * @param callback
337  */
338 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.connect = function (callback) {
339   var self = this;
340   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
341 
342   if (self.connectionOpened === true) {
343     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_ALREADY_OPENED);
344     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
345     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
346       callback.call(self, err);
347     }
348     return;
349   }
350 
351   if (self.connectionPending === true) {
352     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_ALREADY_PENDING);
353     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
354     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
355       callback.call(self, err);
356     }
357     return;
358   }
359 
360   self.connectionPending = true;
361 
362   ActionQueue.enqueue(
363     [
364       function (cb) {
365         self._doGetBrokerPort(self, cb);
366       },
367 
368       function (cb) {
369         self._doDatabaseLogin(self, cb);
370       },
371 
372       function (cb) {
373         self._getEngineVersion(self, cb);
374       }
375     ],
376 
377     function (err) {
378       self.queryPending = false; //reset query execution status
379       self.connectionPending = false;
380       self.connectionOpened = !(typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null);
381       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_CONNECTED);
382       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
383         callback.call(self, err);
384       }
385     }
386   );
387 };
388 
389 /**
390  * Get the server database engine version
391  * @param callback
392  */
393 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getEngineVersion = function (callback) {
394   var self = this;
395   Helpers._emitEvent(self, self._NO_ERROR, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_ENGINE_VERSION_AVAILABLE, self._DB_ENGINE_VER);
396   if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
397     callback.call(self, self._NO_ERROR, self._DB_ENGINE_VER);
398   }
399 };
400 
401 /**
402  * Execute SQL statements in batch mode
403  * @param sqls
404  * @param callback
405  */
406 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.batchExecuteNoQuery = function (sqls, callback) {
407   var self = this;
408   var sqlsArr = null;
409   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
410 
411   if (Array.isArray(sqls)) {
412     if (sqls.length === 0) {
413       //no commands to execute
414       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED);
415       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
416         callback.call(self, err);
417       }
418       return;
419     }
420     sqlsArr = sqls;
421   } else {
422     sqlsArr = new Array(sqls);
423   }
424 
425   for (var i = 0; i < sqlsArr.length; i++) {
426     if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sqlsArr[i])) {
427       err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION);
428       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
429       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
430         callback.call(self, err);
431       }
432       return;
433     }
434   }
435 
436   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
437   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
438 
439   ActionQueue.enqueue(
440     [
441       function (cb) {
442         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
443           self.connect(cb);
444         } else {
445           cb();
446         }
447       },
448 
449       function (cb) {
450         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
451         var batchExecuteNoQueryPacket = new BatchExecuteNoQueryPacket(
452           {
453             SQLs           : sqlsArr,
454             casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
455             autoCommitMode : self.autoCommitMode,
456             dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
457           }
458         );
459         batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
460         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
461 
462         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
463           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
464           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
465             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
466             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
467           }
468           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
469             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
470             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
471             packetReader.write(responseData);
472             batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
473             var errorCode = batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.errorCode;
474             var errorMsg = batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.errorMsg;
475             if (self._DB_ENGINE_VER.startsWith('8.4.3')) {
476               for (var i = 0; i < batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsCode.length; i++) {
477                 if (batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsCode[i] < 0) {
478                   if (err === null) {
479                     err = [];
480                   }
481                   err.push(new Error(batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsCode[i] +
482                     ':' + batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsMsg[i]));
483                 }
484               }
485             } else {
486               if (errorCode !== 0) {
487                 err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
488               }
489             }
490             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
491               cb.call(self, err);
492             }
493           }
494         });
495       }
496     ],
497 
498     function (err) {
499       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED);
500       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
501         callback.call(self, err);
502       }
503     }
504   );
505 };
506 
507 /**
508  * Execute a SQL statement which does not return records
509  * @param sql
510  * @param callback
511  */
512 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.execute = function (sql, callback) {
513   var self = this;
514   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
515 
516   if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sql)) {
517     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION);
518     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
519     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
520       callback.call(self, err);
521     }
522     return null;
523   }
524 
525   var arrSQL = [];
526   arrSQL.push(sql);
527 
528   return self.batchExecuteNoQuery(arrSQL, callback);
529 };
530 
531 /**
532  * Execute sql statement with parameters
533  * @param sql
534  * @param arrParamsValues
535  * @param arrDelimiters
536  * @param callback
537  * @return {*}
538  */
539 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.executeWithParams = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters, callback) {
540   var self = this;
541   var formattedSQL = Helpers._sqlFormat(sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters);
542   Helpers.logInfo('Formatted sql is: ' + formattedSQL);
543 
544   return self.execute(formattedSQL, callback);
545 };
546 
547 /**
548  * Execute sql statement with typed parameters
549  * @param sql
550  * @param arrParamsValues
551  * @param arrParamsDataTypes
552  * @param callback
553  * @return {*}
554  */
555 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.executeWithTypedParams = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrParamsDataTypes, callback) {
556   var self = this;
557   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
558 
559   if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sql)) {
560     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
561     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
562       callback.call(self, err);
563     }
564     return;
565   }
566 
567   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
568   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
569 
570   ActionQueue.enqueue(
571     [
572       function (cb) {
573         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
574           self.connect(cb);
575         } else {
576           cb();
577         }
578       },
579 
580       function (cb) {
581         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
582         var prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket = new PrepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket(
583           {
584             sql            : sql,
585             casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
586             autoCommitMode : self.autoCommitMode,
587             dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER,
588             paramValues    : arrParamsValues,
589             paramTypes     : arrParamsDataTypes
590           }
591         );
592         prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.writePrepare(packetWriter);
593         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
594 
595         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
596           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
597           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
598             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
599             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
600           }
601           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
602             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
603             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
604             packetReader.write(responseData);
605             prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.parsePrepare(packetReader);
606             var errorCode = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorCode;
607             var errorMsg = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorMsg;
608             if (errorCode !== 0) {
609               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
610             }
611             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
612               cb.call(self, err, prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket);
613             }
614           }
615         });
616       },
617 
618       function (prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket, cb) {
619         expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
620         responseData = new Buffer(0);
621         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
622         prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.writeExecute(packetWriter);
623         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
624 
625         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
626           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
627           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
628             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
629             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
630           }
631           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
632             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
633             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
634             packetReader.write(responseData);
635             prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.parseExecute(packetReader);
636             var errorCode = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorCode;
637             var errorMsg = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorMsg;
638             if (errorCode !== 0) {
639               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
640             }
641             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
642               cb.call(self, err);
643             }
644           }
645         });
646       }
647     ],
648 
649     function (err) {
650       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED);
651       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
652         callback.call(self, err);
653       }
654     }
655   );
656 };
657 
658 /**
659  * Execute query and retrieve rows results
660  * @param sql
661  * @param callback
662  */
663 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.query = function (sql, callback) {
664   if (this._ENFORCE_OLD_QUERY_PROTOCOL) {
665     return this._queryOldProtocol(sql, null, null, callback);
666   } else {
667     return this._queryNewProtocol(sql, callback);
668   }
669 };
670 
671 /**
672  * Execute query and retrieve rows results, using the newer 9.x query protocol
673  * @param sql
674  * @param callback
675  */
676 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._queryNewProtocol = function (sql, callback) {
677   var self = this;
678   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
679 
680   if (self.queryPending === true && self._PREVENT_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS) {
681     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_QUERY_ALREADY_PENDING);
682     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
683     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
684       callback.call(self, err);
685     }
686     return;
687   }
688 
689   if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sql)) {
690     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
691     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
692       callback.call(self, err);
693     }
694     return;
695   }
696 
697   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
698   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
699 
700   self.queryPending = true;
701 
702   ActionQueue.enqueue(
703     [
704       function (cb) {
705         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
706           self.connect(cb);
707         } else {
708           cb();
709         }
710       },
711 
712       function (cb) {
713         //Check if data is already in cache
714         if (self._queryCache !== null) {
715           if (self._queryCache.contains(sql)) {
716             self.queryPending = false;
717             //query handle set to null, to prevent further fetch (cache is intended only for small data)
718             Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE, self._queryCache.get(sql), null);
719             if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
720               callback(err, self._queryCache.get(sql), null);
721             }
722             return;
723           }
724         }
725 
726         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
727         var executeQueryPacket = new ExecuteQueryPacket(
728           {
729             sql            : sql,
730             casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
731             autoCommitMode : self.autoCommitMode,
732             dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
733           }
734         );
735         executeQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
736         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
737 
738         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
739           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
740           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
741             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
742             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
743           }
744           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
745             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
746             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
747             packetReader.write(responseData);
748             var result = executeQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
749             var errorCode = executeQueryPacket.errorCode;
750             var errorMsg = executeQueryPacket.errorMsg;
751             if (errorCode !== 0) {
752               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
753             } else {
754               self._queriesPacketList.push(executeQueryPacket);
755             }
756             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
757               if (typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null) {
758                 //self.queryPending = false;
759               } else {
760                 if (self._queryCache !== null) {
761                   self._queryCache.getSet(sql, result);
762                 }
763               }
764               cb.call(self, err, result, executeQueryPacket.queryHandle);
765             }
766           }
767         });
768       }
769     ],
770 
771     function (err, result, handle) {
772       self.queryPending = false;
773       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE, result, handle, sql);
774       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
775         callback.call(self, err, result, handle);
776       }
777     }
778   );
779 };
780 
781 /**
782  * Execute query and retrieve rows results, using the older 8.4.x query protocol
783  * @param sql
784  * @param arrParamsValues
785  * @param arrParamsDataTypes
786  * @param callback
787  */
788 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._queryOldProtocol = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrParamsDataTypes, callback) {
789   var self = this;
790   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
791 
792   if (self.queryPending === true && self._PREVENT_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS) {
793     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_QUERY_ALREADY_PENDING);
794     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
795     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
796       callback.call(self, err);
797     }
798     return;
799   }
800 
801   if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sql)) {
802     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
803     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
804       callback.call(self, err);
805     }
806     return;
807   }
808 
809   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
810   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
811 
812   self.queryPending = true;
813 
814   ActionQueue.enqueue(
815     [
816       function (cb) {
817         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
818           self.connect(cb);
819         } else {
820           cb();
821         }
822       },
823 
824       function (cb) {
825         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
826         var prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket = new PrepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket(
827           {
828             sql            : sql,
829             casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
830             autoCommitMode : self.autoCommitMode,
831             dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER,
832             paramValues    : arrParamsValues,
833             paramTypes     : arrParamsDataTypes
834           }
835         );
836         prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.writePrepare(packetWriter);
837         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
838 
839         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
840           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
841           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
842             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
843             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
844           }
845           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
846             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
847             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
848             packetReader.write(responseData);
849             prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.parsePrepare(packetReader);
850             var errorCode = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorCode;
851             var errorMsg = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorMsg;
852             if (errorCode !== 0) {
853               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
854             }
855             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
856               cb.call(self, err, prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket);
857             }
858           }
859         });
860       },
861 
862       function (prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket, cb) {
863         expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
864         responseData = new Buffer(0);
865         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
866         prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.writeExecute(packetWriter);
867         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
868 
869         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
870           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
871           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
872             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
873             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
874           }
875           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
876             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
877             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
878             packetReader.write(responseData);
879             var result = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.parseExecute(packetReader);
880             var errorCode = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorCode;
881             var errorMsg = prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.errorMsg;
882             if (errorCode !== 0) {
883               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
884             } else {
885               self._queriesPacketList.push(prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket);
886             }
887             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
888               cb.call(self, err, result, prepareExecuteOldProtocolPacket.queryHandle);
889             }
890           }
891         });
892       }
893 
894     ],
895 
896     function (err, result, handle) {
897       self.queryPending = false;
898       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE, result, handle, sql);
899       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
900         callback.call(self, err, result, handle);
901       }
902     }
903   );
904 };
905 
906 /**
907  * Execute query with parameters
908  * @param sql
909  * @param arrParamsValues
910  * @param arrDelimiters
911  * @param callback
912  * @return {*}
913  */
914 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.queryWithParams = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters, callback) {
915   var self = this;
916   var formattedSQL = Helpers._sqlFormat(sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters);
917   Helpers.logInfo('Formatted sql is: ' + formattedSQL);
918 
919   return self.query(formattedSQL, callback);
920 };
921 
922 /**
923  * Execute query with typed parameters
924  * @param sql
925  * @param arrParamsValues
926  * @param arrParamsDataTypes
927  * @param callback
928  * @return {*}
929  */
930 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.queryWithTypedParams = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrParamsDataTypes, callback) {
931   return this._queryOldProtocol(sql, arrParamsValues, arrParamsDataTypes, callback);
932 };
933 
934 /**
935  * Fetch query next rows results
936  * @param queryHandle
937  * @param callback
938  */
939 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.fetch = function (queryHandle, callback) {
940   var self = this;
941   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
942   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
943   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
944 
945   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
946     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
947     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
948       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
949       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
950     }
951     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
952       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
953       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
954       packetReader.write(responseData);
955       var result = fetchPacket.parse(packetReader, self._queriesPacketList[i]);
956       var errorCode = fetchPacket.errorCode;
957       var errorMsg = fetchPacket.errorMsg;
958       if (errorCode !== 0) {
959         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
960       }
961       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_FETCH_DATA_AVAILABLE, result, queryHandle);
962       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
963         callback.call(self, err, result, queryHandle);
964       }
965     }
966   });
967 
968   var foundQueryHandle = false;
969   for (var i = 0; i < self._queriesPacketList.length; i++) {
970     if (self._queriesPacketList[i].queryHandle === queryHandle) {
971       foundQueryHandle = true;
972       break;
973     }
974   }
975 
976   if (!foundQueryHandle) {
977     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NO_ACTIVE_QUERY);
978     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
979     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
980     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
981       callback.call(self, err, null, null);
982     }
983   } else {
984     if (self._queriesPacketList[i].currentTupleCount === self._queriesPacketList[i].totalTupleCount) {
985       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
986       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_FETCH_NO_MORE_DATA_AVAILABLE, queryHandle);
987       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
988         callback.call(self, err, null, queryHandle);
989       }
990     } else {
991       var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
992       var fetchPacket = new FetchPacket(
993         {
994           casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
995           db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
996         }
997       );
998       fetchPacket.write(packetWriter, self._queriesPacketList[i]);
999       self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1000     }
1001   }
1002 };
1003 
1004 /**
1005  * Close query
1006  * @param queryHandle
1007  * @param callback
1008  */
1009 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.closeQuery = function (queryHandle, callback) {
1010   var self = this;
1011   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1012   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1013   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1014 
1015   if (!Helpers._validateInputPositive(queryHandle)) {
1016     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1017     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1018       callback.call(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION));
1019     }
1020     return;
1021   }
1022 
1023   self.queryPending = false;
1024 
1025   var foundQueryHandle = false;
1026   for (var i = 0; i < self._queriesPacketList.length; i++) {
1027     if (self._queriesPacketList[i].queryHandle === queryHandle) {
1028       foundQueryHandle = true;
1029       break;
1030     }
1031   }
1032   if (!foundQueryHandle) {
1033     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NO_ACTIVE_QUERY + ": " + queryHandle);
1034     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1035     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1036     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1037       callback.call(self, err, null);
1038     }
1039   } else {
1040     // Check if closing a query in the queriesQueue
1041     // In this case, if there is a query executing in a queue try to close later
1042     if (self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED) {
1043       // check if some query is still in execution
1044       for (i = 0; i < self._queriesQueue.length; i++) {
1045         if (self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.HANDLE] === queryHandle &&
1046           self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] === self._QUERY_STATUS.IN_EXECUTION) {
1047           Helpers.logInfo('...found a query in execution: ' + self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.SQL] + ' ...retrying later...]');
1048           // retry queue processing after a while
1049           setTimeout(function () {
1050             self.closeQuery(queryHandle, callback);
1051           }, self._QUERIES_QUEUE_CHECK_INTERVAL);
1052           return;
1053         }
1054       }
1055     }
1056     var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1057     var closeQueryPacket = new CloseQueryPacket(
1058       {
1059         casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1060         reqHandle  : queryHandle,
1061         db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1062       }
1063     );
1064     closeQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
1065     self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1066   }
1067 
1068   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1069     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1070     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1071       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1072       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1073     }
1074     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1075       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1076       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1077       packetReader.write(responseData);
1078       closeQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
1079       var errorCode = closeQueryPacket.errorCode;
1080       var errorMsg = closeQueryPacket.errorMsg;
1081       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1082         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1083       } else {
1084         for (var i = 0; i < self._queriesPacketList.length; i++) {
1085           if (self._queriesPacketList[i].queryHandle === queryHandle) {
1086             self._queriesPacketList.splice(i, 1);
1087             break;
1088           }
1089         }
1090         // Remove query from queue
1091         if (self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED) {
1092           for (i = 0; i < self._queriesQueue.length; i++) {
1093             if (self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.HANDLE] === queryHandle) {
1094               // Remove query from queue
1095               self._queriesQueue.splice(i, 1);
1096             }
1097           }
1098         }
1099       }
1100       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_QUERY_CLOSED, queryHandle);
1101       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1102         callback.call(self, err, queryHandle);
1103       }
1104     }
1105   });
1106 };
1107 
1108 /**
1109  * Close connection
1110  * @param callback
1111  */
1112 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.close = function (callback) {
1113   var self = this;
1114   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1115   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1116   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1117 
1118   if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
1119     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_ALREADY_CLOSED);
1120     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1121     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1122       callback.call(self, err);
1123     }
1124     return;
1125   }
1126 
1127   //reset connection status
1128   self.queryPending = false;
1129   self.connectionPending = false;
1130   self.connectionOpened = false;
1131 
1132   ActionQueue.enqueue(
1133     [
1134       function (cb) {
1135         ActionQueue.while(
1136           function () {
1137             return (self._queriesPacketList[0] !== null && self._queriesPacketList[0] !== undefined);
1138           },
1139 
1140           function (callb) {
1141             self.closeQuery(self._queriesPacketList[0].queryHandle, callb);
1142           },
1143 
1144           function (err) {
1145             //log non-blocking error
1146             if (typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null) {
1147               Helpers.logError(ErrorMessages.ERROR_ON_CLOSE_QUERY_HANDLE + err);
1148             }
1149             cb.call(null);
1150           }
1151         );
1152       },
1153 
1154       function (cb) {
1155         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1156         var closeDatabasePacket = new CloseDatabasePacket(
1157           {
1158             casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1159             db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1160           }
1161         );
1162         closeDatabasePacket.write(packetWriter);
1163         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1164 
1165         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1166           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1167           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1168             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1169             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1170           }
1171           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1172             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1173             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1174             packetReader.write(responseData);
1175             closeDatabasePacket.parse(packetReader);
1176             //Close internal socket connection
1177             self._socket.destroy();
1178             var errorCode = closeDatabasePacket.errorCode;
1179             var errorMsg = closeDatabasePacket.errorMsg;
1180             if (errorCode !== 0) {
1181               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1182             }
1183             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1184               cb.call(self, err);
1185             }
1186           }
1187         });
1188       }
1189     ],
1190 
1191     function (err) {
1192       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_CONNECTION_CLOSED);
1193       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1194         callback.call(self, err);
1195       }
1196     }
1197   );
1198 };
1199 
1200 /**
1201  * Start transaction
1202  * @param callback
1203  */
1204 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.beginTransaction = function (callback) {
1205   var self = this;
1206   _toggleAutoCommitMode(self, self.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF, function (err) {
1207     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_BEGIN_TRANSACTION);
1208     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1209       callback.call(self, err);
1210     }
1211   });
1212 };
1213 
1214 /**
1215  * Set session auto-commit mode
1216  * @param autoCommitMode
1217  * @param callback
1218  */
1219 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.setAutoCommitMode = function (autoCommitMode, callback) {
1220   var self = this;
1221   _toggleAutoCommitMode(self, autoCommitMode, function (err) {
1222     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_SET_AUTOCOMMIT_MODE_COMPLETED);
1223     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1224       callback.call(self, err);
1225     }
1226   });
1227 };
1228 
1229 /**
1230  * Rollback transaction
1231  * @param callback
1232  */
1233 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.rollback = function (callback) {
1234   var self = this;
1235   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1236   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1237   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1238 
1239   if (self.autoCommitMode === false) {
1240     var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1241     var rollbackPacket = new RollbackPacket(
1242       {
1243         casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1244         db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1245       }
1246     );
1247     rollbackPacket.write(packetWriter);
1248     self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1249   } else {
1250     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1251     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NO_ROLLBACK);
1252     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1253     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1254       callback.call(self, err);
1255     }
1256   }
1257 
1258   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1259     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1260     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1261       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1262       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1263     }
1264     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1265       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1266       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1267       packetReader.write(responseData);
1268       rollbackPacket.parse(packetReader);
1269       var errorCode = rollbackPacket.errorCode;
1270       var errorMsg = rollbackPacket.errorMsg;
1271       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1272         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1273       }
1274       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_ROLLBACK_COMPLETED);
1275       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1276         callback.call(self, err);
1277       }
1278     }
1279   });
1280 };
1281 
1282 /**
1283  * Commit transaction
1284  * @param callback
1285  */
1286 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.commit = function (callback) {
1287   var self = this;
1288   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1289   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1290   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1291 
1292   if (self.autoCommitMode === false) {
1293     var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1294     var commitPacket = new CommitPacket(
1295       {
1296         casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1297         db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1298       }
1299     );
1300     commitPacket.write(packetWriter);
1301     self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1302   } else {
1303     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1304     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NO_COMMIT);
1305     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1306     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1307       callback.call(self, err);
1308     }
1309   }
1310 
1311   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1312     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1313     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1314       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1315       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1316     }
1317     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1318       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1319       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1320       packetReader.write(responseData);
1321       commitPacket.parse(packetReader);
1322       var errorCode = commitPacket.errorCode;
1323       var errorMsg = commitPacket.errorMsg;
1324       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1325         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1326       }
1327       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_COMMIT_COMPLETED);
1328       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1329         callback.call(self, err);
1330       }
1331     }
1332   });
1333 };
1334 
1335 /**
1336  * Set Auto-commit mode
1337  * @param self
1338  * @param autoCommitMode
1339  * @param callback
1340  * @private
1341  */
1342 function _toggleAutoCommitMode(self, autoCommitMode, callback) {
1343   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1344   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1345   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1346 
1347   if (!Helpers._validateInputBoolean(autoCommitMode)) {
1348     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1349     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1350       callback.call(self, err);
1351     }
1352     return;
1353   }
1354 
1355   if (self.autoCommitMode === autoCommitMode) {
1356     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1357       callback.call(self, err);
1358       return;
1359     }
1360   }
1361 
1362   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1363   var setAutoCommitModePacket = new SetAutoCommitModePacket(
1364     {
1365       casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
1366       autoCommitMode : autoCommitMode,
1367       dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1368     }
1369   );
1370   setAutoCommitModePacket.write(packetWriter);
1371   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1372 
1373   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1374     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1375     if (expectedResponseLength === -1 && responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1376       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1377     }
1378     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1379       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1380       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1381       packetReader.write(responseData);
1382       setAutoCommitModePacket.parse(packetReader);
1383       var errorCode = setAutoCommitModePacket.errorCode;
1384       var errorMsg = setAutoCommitModePacket.errorMsg;
1385       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1386         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1387       } else {
1388         self.autoCommitMode = autoCommitMode;
1389       }
1390 
1391       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1392         callback.call(self, err);
1393       }
1394     }
1395   });
1396 }
1397 
1398 /**
1399  * Get database schema information
1400  * @param schemaType
1401  * @param tableNameFilter
1402  * @param callback
1403  */
1404 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getSchema = function (schemaType, tableNameFilter, callback) {
1405   var self = this;
1406   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1407 
1408   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1409   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1410 
1411   ActionQueue.enqueue(
1412     [
1413       function (cb) {
1414         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
1415           self.connect(cb);
1416         } else {
1417           cb();
1418         }
1419       },
1420 
1421       function (cb) {
1422         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1423         var getSchemaPacket = new GetSchemaPacket(
1424           {
1425             casInfo          : self._CASInfo,
1426             schemaType       : schemaType,
1427             tableNamePattern : tableNameFilter,
1428             db_version       : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1429           }
1430         );
1431         getSchemaPacket.writeRequestSchema(packetWriter);
1432         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1433 
1434         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1435           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1436           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1437             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1438             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1439           }
1440           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1441             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1442             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1443             packetReader.write(responseData);
1444             getSchemaPacket.parseRequestSchema(packetReader);
1445             var errorCode = getSchemaPacket.errorCode;
1446             var errorMsg = getSchemaPacket.errorMsg;
1447             if (errorCode !== 0) {
1448               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1449             }
1450             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1451               cb.call(self, err, getSchemaPacket);
1452             }
1453           }
1454         });
1455       },
1456 
1457       function (getSchemaPacket, cb) {
1458         expectedResponseLength = -1;
1459         var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1460         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1461         getSchemaPacket.writeFetchSchema(packetWriter);
1462         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1463 
1464         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1465           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1466           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1467             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1468             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1469           }
1470           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1471             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1472             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1473             packetReader.write(responseData);
1474             var result = getSchemaPacket.parseFetchSchema(packetReader);
1475             var errorCode = getSchemaPacket.errorCode;
1476             var errorMsg = getSchemaPacket.errorMsg;
1477             if (errorCode !== 0) {
1478               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1479             }
1480             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1481               cb.call(self, err, result);
1482             }
1483           }
1484         });
1485       }
1486     ],
1487 
1488     function (err, result) {
1489       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_SCHEMA_DATA_AVAILABLE, result);
1490       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1491         callback.call(self, err, result);
1492       }
1493     }
1494   );
1495 };
1496 
1497 /**
1498  * Create a new LOB object
1499  * @param lobType
1500  * @param callback
1501  */
1502 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.lobNew = function (lobType, callback) {
1503   var self = this;
1504   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1505 
1506   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1507   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1508 
1509   ActionQueue.enqueue(
1510     [
1511       function (cb) {
1512         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
1513           self.connect(cb);
1514         } else {
1515           cb();
1516         }
1517       },
1518 
1519       function (cb) {
1520         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1521         var lobNewPacket = new LOBNewPacket(
1522           {
1523             casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1524             lobType    : lobType,
1525             db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1526           }
1527         );
1528         lobNewPacket.write(packetWriter);
1529         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1530 
1531         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1532           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1533           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1534             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1535             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1536           }
1537           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1538             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1539             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1540             packetReader.write(responseData);
1541             var lobObject = lobNewPacket.parse(packetReader);
1542             var errorCode = lobNewPacket.errorCode;
1543             var errorMsg = lobNewPacket.errorMsg;
1544             if (errorCode !== 0) {
1545               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1546             }
1547             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1548               cb.call(self, err, lobObject);
1549             }
1550           }
1551         });
1552       }
1553     ],
1554 
1555     function (err, lobObject) {
1556       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_LOB_NEW_COMPLETED, lobObject);
1557       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1558         callback.call(self, err, lobObject);
1559       }
1560     }
1561   );
1562 };
1563 
1564 /**
1565  * Write data to a LOB object
1566  * @param lobObject
1567  * @param position
1568  * @param dataBuffer
1569  * @param callback
1570  */
1571 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.lobWrite = function (lobObject, position, dataBuffer, callback) {
1572   var self = this;
1573   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1574 
1575   if (lobObject.lobLength + 1 !== position) {
1576     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INVALID_LOB_POSITION);
1577     Helpers.logError(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INVALID_LOB_POSITION);
1578     callback.call(null);
1579   }
1580 
1581   position--;
1582   var realWriteLen, writeLen;
1583   var totalWriteLen = 0;
1584   var len = dataBuffer.length;
1585   var offset = 0;
1586 
1587   ActionQueue.while(
1588     function () {
1589       return len > 0;
1590     },
1591 
1592     function (cb) {
1593       var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1594       var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1595       writeLen = Math.min(len, self._LOB_MAX_IO_LENGTH);
1596       var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1597       var dataToWrite = null;
1598       if (lobObject.lobType === CASConstants.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_BLOB) {
1599         dataToWrite = dataBuffer.slice(position, position + writeLen);
1600       } else {
1601         if (lobObject.lobType === CASConstants.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_CLOB) {
1602           dataToWrite = dataBuffer.substring(position, position + writeLen);
1603         }
1604       }
1605       var lobWritePacket = new LOBWritePacket(
1606         {
1607           casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1608           lobObject  : lobObject,
1609           position   : position,
1610           data       : dataToWrite,
1611           writeLen   : writeLen,
1612           db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1613         }
1614       );
1615       lobWritePacket.write(packetWriter);
1616       self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1617 
1618       self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1619         responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1620         if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1621           responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1622           expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1623         }
1624         if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1625           self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1626           var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1627           packetReader.write(responseData);
1628           responseData = new Buffer(0);
1629           realWriteLen = lobWritePacket.parse(packetReader);
1630           position = position + realWriteLen;
1631           len -= realWriteLen;
1632           offset += realWriteLen;
1633           totalWriteLen += realWriteLen;
1634           var errorCode = lobWritePacket.errorCode;
1635           var errorMsg = lobWritePacket.errorMsg;
1636           if (errorCode !== 0) {
1637             err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1638           }
1639           if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1640             cb.call(self, err);
1641           }
1642         }
1643       });
1644     },
1645 
1646     function (err) {
1647       if (totalWriteLen > lobObject.lobLength) {
1648         lobObject.lobLength = totalWriteLen;
1649       }
1650       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_LOB_WRITE_COMPLETED, lobObject, totalWriteLen);
1651       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1652         callback.call(self, err, lobObject, totalWriteLen);
1653       }
1654     });
1655 };
1656 
1657 /**
1658  * Read a LOB object from the database
1659  * @param lobObject
1660  * @param position
1661  * @param length
1662  * @param callback
1663  */
1664 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.lobRead = function (lobObject, position, length, callback) {
1665   var self = this;
1666   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1667   var buffer;
1668 
1669   if (lobObject.lobType === CASConstants.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_CLOB) {
1670     buffer = '';
1671   } else {
1672     buffer = new Buffer(0);
1673   }
1674 
1675   position--;
1676   if (lobObject.lobLength < position + length) {
1677     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INVALID_LOB_POSITION);
1678     Helpers.logError(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INVALID_LOB_POSITION);
1679     callback.call(null);
1680   }
1681 
1682   var realReadLen;
1683   var readLen;
1684   var totalReadLen = 0;
1685 
1686   ActionQueue.while(
1687     function () {
1688       return length > 0;
1689     },
1690 
1691     function (cb) {
1692       var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1693       var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1694       readLen = Math.min(length, self._LOB_MAX_IO_LENGTH);
1695       var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1696       var lobReadPacket = new LOBReadPacket(
1697         {
1698           casInfo      : self._CASInfo,
1699           lobObject    : lobObject,
1700           position     : position,
1701           lengthToRead : length,
1702           db_version   : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1703         }
1704       );
1705       lobReadPacket.write(packetWriter);
1706       self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1707 
1708       self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1709         responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1710         if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1711           responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1712           expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1713         }
1714         if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1715           self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1716           var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1717           packetReader.write(responseData);
1718           realReadLen = lobReadPacket.parse(packetReader);
1719           position += realReadLen;
1720           length -= realReadLen;
1721           totalReadLen += realReadLen;
1722           if (realReadLen === 0) {
1723             length = 0;
1724           }
1725           if (lobObject.lobType === CASConstants.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_CLOB) {
1726             buffer += lobReadPacket.lobBuffer;
1727           } else {
1728             buffer = Helpers._combineData(buffer, lobReadPacket.lobBuffer);
1729           }
1730           var errorCode = lobReadPacket.errorCode;
1731           var errorMsg = lobReadPacket.errorMsg;
1732           if (errorCode !== 0) {
1733             err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1734           }
1735           if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1736             cb.call(self, err);
1737           }
1738         }
1739       });
1740     },
1741 
1742     function (err) {
1743       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_LOB_READ_COMPLETED, buffer, totalReadLen);
1744       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1745         callback.call(self, err, buffer, totalReadLen);
1746       }
1747     });
1748 };
1749 
1750 /**
1751  * Set connection timeout value. If set to 0, the timeout is reset to none.
1752  * @param timeout (.msec)
1753  */
1754 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.setConnectionTimeout = function (timeout) {
1755   if (timeout >= 0 && this._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT !== timeout) {
1756     this._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = timeout;
1757   } else {
1758     this._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = 0;
1759   }
1760 };
1761 
1762 /**
1763  * Returns the connection timeout
1764  * @return {Number} (.msec)
1765  */
1766 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getConnectionTimeout = function () {
1767   return this._CONNECTION_TIMEOUT;
1768 };
1769 
1770 /**
1771  * Set a database parameter
1772  * @param parameter id
1773  * @param value
1774  * @param callback
1775  */
1776 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.setDatabaseParameter = function (parameter, value, callback) {
1777   var self = this;
1778   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1779   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1780   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1781 
1782   if (parameter === CASConstants.CCIDbParam.CCI_PARAM_MAX_STRING_LENGTH) {
1783     var errorCode = -1011;
1784     var errorMsg = Helpers._resolveErrorCode(errorCode);
1785     err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1786     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1787     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1788       callback.call(self, err);
1789     }
1790     return;
1791   }
1792 
1793   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1794   var setDbParameterPacket = new SetDbParameterPacket(
1795     {
1796       casInfo   : self._CASInfo,
1797       parameter : parameter,
1798       value     : value
1799     }
1800   );
1801 
1802   setDbParameterPacket.write(packetWriter);
1803   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1804 
1805   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1806     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1807     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1808       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1809       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1810     }
1811     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1812       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1813       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1814       packetReader.write(responseData);
1815       setDbParameterPacket.parse(packetReader);
1816       var errorCode = setDbParameterPacket.errorCode;
1817       var errorMsg = setDbParameterPacket.errorMsg;
1818       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1819         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1820       }
1821       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_SET_DB_PARAMETER_COMPLETED, null);
1822       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1823         callback.call(self, err);
1824       }
1825     }
1826   });
1827 };
1828 
1829 /**
1830  * Get a database parameter
1831  * @param parameter id
1832  * @param callback
1833  */
1834 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getDatabaseParameter = function (parameter, callback) {
1835   var self = this;
1836   var err = self._NO_ERROR;
1837   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1838   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1839 
1840   if (parameter === CASConstants.CCIDbParam.CCI_PARAM_MAX_STRING_LENGTH) {
1841     var errorCode = -1011;
1842     var errorMsg = Helpers._resolveErrorCode(errorCode);
1843     err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1844     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
1845     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1846       callback.call(self, err);
1847     }
1848     return;
1849   }
1850 
1851   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1852   var getDbParameterPacket = new GetDbParameterPacket(
1853     {
1854       casInfo   : self._CASInfo,
1855       parameter : parameter
1856     }
1857   );
1858 
1859   getDbParameterPacket.write(packetWriter);
1860   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1861 
1862   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1863     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1864     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1865       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1866       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1867     }
1868     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1869       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1870       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1871       packetReader.write(responseData);
1872       getDbParameterPacket.parse(packetReader);
1873       var errorCode = getDbParameterPacket.errorCode;
1874       var errorMsg = getDbParameterPacket.errorMsg;
1875       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1876         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1877       }
1878       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_GET_DB_PARAMETER_COMPLETED, getDbParameterPacket.value);
1879       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1880         callback.call(self, err, getDbParameterPacket.value);
1881       }
1882     }
1883   });
1884 };
1885 
1886 /**
1887  * Set the protocol to be used for queries execution.
1888  * If set to true, the driver will use the (old) 8.4.x protocol.
1889  * If set to false, the driver will use the newer 9.x protocol.
1890  * @param enforceOldProtocol
1891  */
1892 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.setEnforceOldQueryProtocol = function (enforceOldProtocol) {
1893   if (this._ENFORCE_OLD_QUERY_PROTOCOL !== enforceOldProtocol) {
1894     this._ENFORCE_OLD_QUERY_PROTOCOL = enforceOldProtocol;
1895   }
1896 };
1897 
1898 /**
1899  * Returns the protocol used for queries execution.
1900  * If true, the driver uses the (old) 8.4.x protocol.
1901  * If false, the driver uses the newer 9.x protocol.
1902  * @private
1903  */
1904 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getEnforceOldQueryProtocol = function () {
1905   return this._ENFORCE_OLD_QUERY_PROTOCOL;
1906 };
1907 
1908 /**
1909  * Add a query to the queries queue
1910  * @param sql SQL query to execute
1911  * @param callback
1912  */
1913 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.addQuery = function (sql, callback) {
1914   var self = this;
1915 
1916   // -1: No valid handle for the query yet, as the query is pending execution start
1917   self._queriesQueue.push([-1, sql, self._QUERY_STATUS.NOT_STARTED, callback, self._SQL_TYPE.IS_QUERY]);
1918 
1919   if (self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED === false) {
1920     self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED = true;
1921     self._enableQueriesBackgroundProcessor();
1922   }
1923 };
1924 
1925 //TODO Add support for non queries in the queue:
1926 /**
1927  * Add a non-query (direct SQL execute statement) to the queries queue
1928  * @param sql SQL command to execute
1929  * @param callback
1930  */
1931 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.addNonQuery = function (sql, callback) {
1932   var self = this;
1933 
1934   // -1: No valid handle for the command yet, as the command is pending execution start
1935   self._queriesQueue.push([-1, sql, self._QUERY_STATUS.NOT_STARTED, callback, self._SQL_TYPE.IS_NON_QUERY]);
1936 
1937   if (self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED === false) {
1938     self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED = true;
1939     self._enableQueriesBackgroundProcessor();
1940   }
1941 };
1942 
1943 /**
1944  * Execute a query from the queries queue
1945  * @param idx
1946  */
1947 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._executeQuery = function (idx) {
1948   var self = this;
1949 
1950   if (self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.SQL_TYPE] === self._SQL_TYPE.IS_QUERY) {
1951     self.query(self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.SQL], function (err, result, queryHandle) {
1952       self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] = self._QUERY_STATUS.CLOSED;
1953       self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.HANDLE] = queryHandle;
1954 
1955       if (self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.CALLBACK] &&
1956         typeof(self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.CALLBACK]) === 'function') {
1957         self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.CALLBACK].call(self, err, result, queryHandle);
1958       }
1959 
1960       if(err) {
1961         self._queriesQueue.splice(idx, 1);
1962       }
1963     });
1964   } else {
1965     self.execute(self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.SQL], function (err) {
1966       self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] = self._QUERY_STATUS.CLOSED;
1967 
1968       if (self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.CALLBACK] &&
1969         typeof(self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.CALLBACK]) === 'function') {
1970         self._queriesQueue[idx][self._QUERY_INFO.CALLBACK].call(self, err);
1971       }
1972 
1973       //remove the statement from the queue
1974       self._queriesQueue.splice(idx, 1);
1975     });
1976   }
1977 };
1978 
1979 /**
1980  * Queries queue background processor
1981  * @private
1982  */
1983 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._enableQueriesBackgroundProcessor = function () {
1984   var self = this;
1985   var i;
1986 
1987   if (self._queriesQueue.length === 0) {
1988     self._QUERIES_QUEUE_PROCESSOR_STARTED = false;
1989     return;
1990   }
1991 
1992   // check if some query is still in execution
1993   for (i = 0; i < self._queriesQueue.length; i++) {
1994     if (self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] === self._QUERY_STATUS.IN_EXECUTION) {
1995       // retry queue processing after a while
1996       setTimeout(function () {
1997         self._enableQueriesBackgroundProcessor();
1998       }, self._QUERIES_QUEUE_CHECK_INTERVAL);
1999       return;
2000     }
2001   }
2002 
2003   // find the first query not started
2004   for (i = 0; i < self._queriesQueue.length; i++) {
2005     if (self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] === self._QUERY_STATUS.NOT_STARTED) {
2006       self._queriesQueue[i][self._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] = self._QUERY_STATUS.IN_EXECUTION;
2007       self._executeQuery(i);
2008       break;
2009     }
2010   }
2011 
2012   // re-execute queries processor
2013   setTimeout(function () {
2014     self._enableQueriesBackgroundProcessor();
2015   }, self._QUERIES_QUEUE_CHECK_INTERVAL);
2016 };
2017 
2018 /**
2019  * Return true if there are pending queries in the queries queue
2020  * @return {Boolean}
2021  */
2022 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.queriesQueueIsEmpty = function () {
2023   if (this._queriesQueue.length === 0) {
2024     return true;
2025   } else {
2026     var noQueriesPending = true;
2027 
2028     for (var i = 0; i < this._queriesQueue.length; i++) {
2029       if (this._queriesQueue[i][this._QUERY_INFO.STATUS] !== this._QUERY_STATUS.CLOSED) {
2030         noQueriesPending = false;
2031         break;
2032       }
2033     }
2034 
2035     return noQueriesPending;
2036   }
2037 };
2038
